texto: (OD) the development and reinforcement of organizational strategies, structures and processes. Pareto analysis Statistical process that produces a bar chart organized from higher to lower levels of frequency. The Pareto diagram compares the importance of the different factors intervening in a problem and helps to identify action priorities. Payback Period (PP) analysis Review of the amount of time it will take to recover the initial investment of a project. Performance appraisals Tool used to measure employeesâ€™ progress against performance standards. Feedback is also provided at this time.
